name: KLM Royal Dutch Airlines
membership: Airlines for Europe (A4E), International Air Transport Association (IATA) and BusinessEurope.
goal: KLM Royal Dutch Airlines transports passengers and cargo as part of the Air France/KLM airline group.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Environment, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Following EU initiatives on areas like the environment, passenger rights, air traffic management, etc.
